title: Comet Wierzchos Vaults Into the March Evening Sky
desc: It seems that the southern hemisphere gets all the good comets. A bashful binocular comet is about to finally leave its southern perch, and briefly come into view for folks up north. Said comet of the moment is C/2023 E1 Wierzchos. Although the comet just passed perihelion last week, it should put on a fine encore show as it heads north in March at dusk.

title: Toronto General Hospital has been ranked second-best in the world
desc: It has moved up a spot since last year, placing just behind Rochester, Minn.-based Mayo Clinic

title: PSNI created detailed profile of journalist, court told
desc: The PSNI created a detailed profile of Belfast journalist Vincent Kearney, including details of his wife and mother-in-law, as part of an unlawful campaign of monitoring, a tribunal has been told.

title: Amelia Kerr makes dream start to New Zealand captaincy era with special all-round show
desc: NZW vs ZIMW, 1st T20I: Amelia Kerr delivered a stunning all-round performance on Wednesday, smashing a 51-ball century and returning figures of 4-0-14-2 as New Zealand defeated Zimbabwe by 92 runs at Seddon Park in Hamilton.

title: Trump announces new retirement accounts for Americans without 401(k) plans. Here's what to know.
desc: About 50 million workers lack access to employer-sponsored retirement plans, a hurdle to setting aside money for old age.

title: Report: Hezbollah Will Not Intervene if U.S. Carries Out 'Limited' Strikes on Iran, Source Says
desc: Netanyahu: 'Israel Is Stronger Than Ever and India Is Stronger Than Ever'. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi Arrives to Address Knesset Plenary. Opposition Will Attend Modi's Speech, Boycott Knesset Speaker

title: Smash Mouth makes surprise appearance at Tel Aviv's Barby
desc: Smash Mouth made a surprise appearance at Tel Aviv’s Barby club as part of a secret concert series, defying the trend of artists boycotting Israel and drawing an enthusiastic crowd.

title: Gold consolidates as investors weigh US tariffs, Iran talks and Fed outlook
desc: Gold (XAU/USD) stages a modest rebound on Wednesday, trimming part of the previous day’s losses as fresh uncertainty over US trade policy and lingering geopolitical tensions in the Middle East continue to underpin safe-haven demand.

title: Van Cleef & Arpels’s Dance Reflections Festival Returns to New York With Postmodern Classics and Of-the-Moment Imports
desc: Dance Reflections by Van Cleef & Arpels, a three-week festival taking place across New York, features a feast of work drawn from various places and decades—all part of an expansive vision set forth by Serge Laurent, the jewelry house’s director of dance and culture programs.

title: Sensor Tower State of Gaming: Gaming drove $94 Billion in revenue in 2025; downloads reached 52 Billion
desc: /PRNewswire/ -- Sensor Tower, a leading provider of data on the digital economy, today released its annual State of Gaming report for 2026. The report, which...
